reviews.title: Impressive refrigerator
reviews.review_text: We are senior citizens. We had a 31-year-old Amana. We did extensive research to decide on a replacement. Boy, are we happy to have chosen Frigidaire. It is very spacious; the doors can hold a lot of bottled groceries, and the vegetable drawers are high enough to hold a big cabbage or lettuce. I love all the different compartments in the freezer drawer. Every item has its place, eliminating guesswork. More importantly, the appliance fits in the very tight space we had. Thank you Fridgidaire.

reviews.title: Great interior space!
reviews.review_text: I replaced a Samsung with larger exterior dimensions, with this Frigidaire, and find that the interior of this fridge has way more space! Very happy with this purchase. And very affordable. Will most likely upgrade more appliances with this brand.

reviews.title: Counter depth is a game changer
reviews.review_text: I bought this model a month ago, and the highlights of this model are: Space Efficiency: This model is designed to fit flush with my pantry, providing a sleek, built-in look, and added space into the kitchen. Large Capacity: Despite its counter-depth design, it offers ample storage with wide shelves and deep drawers, making it ideal for my cooking enthusiasm. Advanced Cooling Technology: Features like EvenTemp™ cooling system ensures consistent temperatures throughout the fridge, reducing freezer burn and keeping food fresh. Energy Efficiency: Frigidaire refrigerators are known for their energy-efficient designs, helping me save on electricity bills while being environmentally friendly. Convenient Features: Additional features like ice makers, and advanced water filtration. I'm still excited about this fridge, but I have a small disappointment regarding the rebate. The 30-inch model I purchased is listed as a non-eligible item, so the rebate is on hold. I'm not sure if I will receive the $100 rebate. Nonetheless, it is a fantastic fridge!

reviews.title: Great fridge for the spacd
reviews.review_text: So far so good. We've had this fridge for about a month and really like it. We had a difficult time finding a fridge to fit the width and depth of the space in the cabinets and this one's great for those smaller spaces. The inside is quite spacious for a counter depth fridge. The only issue is the floor models in stores had the scoop for the ice maker and we didn't receive one with our fridge.

reviews.title: Good Fridge Overall, but Some Issues After a Few Months
reviews.review_text: I've had this refrigerator since December 10, 2024, and overall, I really like it. It's my first time owning a two-door model with the refrigerator on the bottom, and the storage capacity is more than enough for my needs. Problem: In the past week, I've noticed that the right door doesn't close tightly anymore. I have to push it firmly to make sure it's sealed, as if the magnetic seal isn't holding as well as it used to. I have no idea why this issue suddenly started, so I'll need to check the warranty. Cons: The ice maker makes a terrible noise, so I keep it disabled. Suggested improvements: I would love to see an extra drawer dedicated to cheeses and deli meats, as well as a light inside the freezer.

reviews.title: Mostly good!
reviews.review_text: I bought it mainly because it's counter depth. It's a pretty basic fridge. For the money, I would've expected a couple of extra features…. Like a light in the freezer and a meat/cheese drawer and an alarm if the door is left ajar.. other than that, it's roomy and bright keeps my food cold.

reviews.title: Love the space in this fridge
reviews.review_text: Bought this fridge a month ago and I'm really liking it! I love the shelves/containers on the fridge doors! Holds so many more condiments than my last fridge. And while smaller than my last fridge, it holds way more. The space is much better utilized. Really enjoying it so far

reviews.title: Lack of Manual
reviews.review_text: Have had the refrigerator for a week and my big complaint is that there is no manual to explain cleaning, setting temperature, changing filter, etc. Can't find one online either. I had to find a YouTube video to let me know how to install the door bins. What is this?? I like the refrigerator otherwise. But, like others, sometimes the door don't close properly because the flap doesn't lay flat when closing.

reviews.title: Good appliance.
reviews.review_text: Keeps everything cold, easy to use. Would have given 4 stars except the left door still after a year does not close smoothly. The compressor is loud on initial start up, quiets after about 5 seconds. The freezer is 3 drawers but from the size could really stand to be 2 drawers to fit larger items. Freezer could also use a light. It does the job though after a year in it keeps good temperature. Our options were limited due to overall size of the unit having to fit an existing opening.

reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this fridge. But it hasn't been great. The French doors are really clunky. The whole thing shakes when you close them. The inside isn't very well laid out. The freezer doors are drawers which also clunk closed. There isn't a ton of space for ice trays in the freezer. The

reviews.title: Ridiculous and extremely inept
reviews.review_text: Didn't come. Was told to reorder so I did and now the app says I have received the fridge. Was told I received my.refund as well but they are charging me for a delivery and appliance removal that never happened. That's just ridiculous.

reviews.title: Like it a lot
reviews.review_text: I do love this fridge. The only issue I have is that there are only 2 drawers in the fridge. Ice maker is a little clunky. Shelves are not rigid so have to be careful how you load them or they bow in the middle. Not a fan of that.

reviews.title: Perfect solution - attractive, space efficient, and more usable space than our last larger fridge.
reviews.review_text: We replaced a larger fridge in our kitchen that did not really fit. This Fridge has been easy to install, and has more room inside than our last, it has been a very good investment. Great value for the price

reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
reviews.review_text: We bought our new Frigidaire to replace our dated model a few weeks ago. Our old model withstood the test of time and we wanted an upgrade. If I could rate this model a 6 I would, they have perfected the design and it's night and day compared to the older models.

reviews.title: We need more capacity
reviews.review_text: I bought this cooler 2 week a ago because Ive got a new house. When a had to do my first grocery im arrived to my house and I dosent have much place into that cooler. So in general beautiful luminosity the outdoor color os beautiful and Thats easy to clean. I recommand at my friends to buy that one because im Really happy o got thanks you so much FRIDGIDAIRE

reviews.title: Perfect fit for the house
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased a Frigidaire refrigerator, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! The sleek design fits perfectly in my kitchen, giving it a modern and stylish look. It's not just about aesthetics—the performance is outstanding. The cooling system keeps everything fresh for longer, and the spacious interior is thoughtfully designed to maximize storage. I especially love the adjustable shelves, which make organizing groceries a breeze. The energy efficiency is another bonus—it's both eco-friendly and budget-friendly. Frigidaire truly delivers a perfect blend of functionality, quality, and style. Highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and elegant fridge!

reviews.title: Well Thought Out
reviews.review_text: We bought this fridge to replace a still work but old one. I like the ice maker being hidden in the freezer section. We don't have a water connection so this is something that down the road we could attach but aren't required. It even has the option to turn it off or on. Space wise for the size of the fridge it makes good use of the space provided and everything inside is well lite. Very modern and the material seems fairly strong. Metal isn't thin or flimsy. Overall we are pleased with the unit and the price was fantastic.

reviews.title: Good Size
reviews.review_text: The fridge was delivered 3 weeks ago. It seemed to be the only model at that price range that fit our space for one. I could not find another one of height just short of 70". Its temperature controls are easy to use. Overall we are happy with it.

reviews.title: Cool fridge
reviews.review_text: As a retired couple, my wife an I no longer have to bend to reach for the vegies and fruits. French door design in wonderful. Because of the way the doors open and close, closing the left side door can jam if not careful because of the design. Hard to explain. The outer material a bit thin. So it it a decent quality, in terms of materials, but not the best. Perfectly OK, though,

reviews.title: Excellent fridge, spacious
reviews.review_text: We purchased this fridge for our new basement kitchenette and are so happy that we did. Counter depth is perfect, and it replaces an older smaller fridge, so we are very happy with all of the room. French doors are always our favorite, and looking forward getting the icemaker hooked up for our kitchenette/bar. Only one thing that would improve this model would be to have an interior light in the freezer. Otherwise a 10/10.

reviews.title: Nice fridge!
reviews.review_text: I have been using the fridge for about 1.5 months and it has done the job. I previously had Gallery line products so this was a little step down. The LED lights add a really nice touch and keep the inside very well lit. The doors feel a bit light but it isn't a huge deal, as I know this is a lower end product.

reviews.title: New Fridge works Fine
reviews.review_text: We bought this fridge on the recommendation of a friend who has the same fridge. It runs quietly and keeps a constant temperature. Putting in the door shelves was a challenge as they are tight (which means they won't fall out) but we were worried about breaking them since they are plastic and a lot of force is needed to snap them in. The fridge has a lot of space for a 32” but it lacks a dedicated space for eggs - so we just leave them in the cartons. Overall we like the fridge and we doubt it will last as long as our last fridge did - 22 years and still going - but that may be too much to expect - newer appliances don't seem to be made like they were in the past.

reviews.title: Good fridge
reviews.review_text: This is a good fridge, it looks sleek, works well and the light is nice inside. But there is no light in the freezer and sometimes the middle magnet that should open all the way when you open the doors sometimes don't open all the way so when you close it bumps abruptly and you have to manually place it back. It's annoying.

reviews.title: Excellent fridge upgrade
reviews.review_text: This is our first new fridge since moving into our home. The lights in this fridge are bright and allow you to find anything you've stored inside. We enjoy the large basins as well. We have a two year old who loves hanging off the lower handle for the freezer. The handle holds up well.

reviews.title: Very nice fridge
reviews.review_text: Perfect size for older home that might not be able to fit a tall refrigerator. Only issue we had was that the bins that go in the doors are almost impossible to insert, you need to put dishwasher soap to lubricate them to slide in. Otherwise it's perfect, quiet and bright.

reviews.title: Good Fit
reviews.review_text: The fridge was the right height and width for our restricted space. I like the fridge above to avoid bending and there is plenty of space inside. I would have liked a dedicated meat drawer. Getting the drawers installed in the doors was tricky. I would have liked a paper manual with clearer instructions rather than having to go online. Generally the fridge is quiet but occasionally makes a louder sound as it tries to access ice-making (we didn't hook that up). The freezer section has pull-out drawers that allow for ease of organization. Looks shiny and enhances our kitchen.

reviews.title: Fantastic little fridge
reviews.review_text: Our freezer stopped working on our old fridge so we needed to buy a new one pretty quickly. This one was perfect as counter-depth as our old one was too large for our small kitchen. Love the three drawers in the freezer. Only complaint is there is no "cheese" drawer and the crisper drawers are smaller than what we had previously. So far 1 month in the fridge works fantastic. Just be careful with the manual as ours was missing information on how to set the fridge temperature.

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: I bought this a month ago and so far am quite pleased with it. My old fridge came with the house and was well over twenty years old - it was a fabulous fridge and held a LOT of stuff. New fridges now are designed quite differently and seem far less spacious. The things I like most about this fridge is the layout. Without the extra crisper drawer, there is a ton more room to put taller items - all other fridges you are pretty much limited to the door. So far it runs well and is reasonably quiet. I like the counter depth as it blends well and doesn't stick out into the room - though that does compromise somewhat on the holding capacity, which is fine for my home. I would have preferred to not have the ice maker as I can't connect to water and it's a waste of space. The freezer drawer layout works well though, and it's nice to organize the compartments. Overall it's a great fridge and I'm very pleased with it.

reviews.title: Refreshing upgrade
reviews.review_text: Bright lights inside the cabinet lets you see everything inside your fridge. The stainless doors do not leave any finger prints. The double doors gives a better access to all parts of the cabinet. The auto ice maker is a bonus as we have not had this feature before. Fits snugly into our counter depth space

reviews.title: Just bought but so far very good
reviews.review_text: This fridge replaced another fridge that was unrepairable after just 6 months after purchasing brand new. Hopefully this one will last a little longer.

reviews.title: Nice fridge
reviews.review_text: Bought a month ago and seems to be a good fridge. Although there is 3 lights in the fridge, they are all positioned in the front. 1 on each side at the front and 1 at the top middle front. I feel the top light should be positioned at the back.

reviews.title: Very Happy!
reviews.review_text: We are very pleased with our new fridge! It fits in very well with our updated 1974 kitchen. I particularly like the ease of opening the freezer and the ability to see everything at a glance.

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge for my small kitchen reno. I needed a small counter depth and it fits the bill. Works well and the interior light gradually brightens when you open the door so you aren't blinded.

reviews.title: I'm pleased with the freezer, there is so much dedicated space to separate items.
reviews.review_text: I had a larger fridge and was concerned that the new fridge would not have enough room but, the overall design of the fridge is brilliant. I am happy with my decision to purchase it.

reviews.title: Just right!
reviews.review_text: Have had my new fridge for a couple of weeks. Replaced an older fridge that had a faulty ice maker, was too big for the limited kitchen space and an impractical interior layout. The new fridge addressed those issues, and also allowed me to access the upper cupboards which were previously blocked. Happy with my new purchase!

reviews.title: The French Door model was the correct choice !
reviews.review_text: Easiest of the 3 new Appliances to Install . Misread an earlier description describing a Light in the Freezer Drawer . There isn't one . Surprised but pleased that there aren't any fans or cooling coils that need regular cleaning . One less thing to do . Nice !

reviews.title: Fits in perfectly!
reviews.review_text: I just bought the fridge about three weeks ago and it's working like a charm right out of the box. The overall look is terrific and the features I've used so far have been first rate. The refrigeration area is large and can accommodate quite a bit of food which came in handy during the holiday season. The freezer compartment is also voluminous but a bit cut up which makes it a bit tricky if you have more than a few large items (a turkey, a ham and a box of frozen puff pastries on top of all the everyday items). It's a good thing we're experts as Tetris. So far, it's been all we really needed.

reviews.title: Great fit for a small space
reviews.review_text: My kitchen can only accommodate a 30" wide appliance and most counter-depth fridges are 36". Having had one in a previous home, I really wanted another counter-depth model and this fits the bill for a small space without sacrificing too much capacity. I am really happy with my purchase!

reviews.title: Good but smallish for a family of four.
reviews.review_text: Very cute little fridge. Simple, elegant, high quality, and cleanly laid out. Manageable for a family of four but is smaller than our old fridge which had 25 cubic feet so we're still getting used to the smaller size. Love the style and simplicity. Also love the interior lighting. Everything looks like it's in the middle of a photo shoot. My only caveats are that the left door's vertically hinged seal doesn't alway open all the way, so closing the left door sometimes gets caught, slamming against the right. Also there is sometimes is a loud clunking sound on the bottom left side when opening the freezer drawer. Other than that we find it very cute and endearing and hope it will last with us for the next decade or so. Cheers!

reviews.title: Very happy with my 17.6 cu ft. fridge
reviews.review_text: We needed a smaller sized fridge to fit inside the cabinet opening. Surprisingly, this new fridge seems to be roomier inside and holds more than our previously larger one. We've only had it for a few weeks but so far we have no issues with it. It looks great too! I wish a hard copy user manual was provided though. I'm not fond of downloading a pdf version. I'm praying this fridge lasts as long as our 21 year old Kenmore did.

reviews.title: Superior quality, excellent reliability and terrific day to day home use
reviews.review_text: I purchased this approximately a month ago, as a replacement to my previous Frigidaire that lasted forever. I purchased a new Frigidaire because I wanted to refresh my old refrigerator. Knowing that Frigidaire is one of the highest quality appliance companies out there, I did not hesitate to purchase this. Money was no issue. I could have purchased another brand, but knowing that Frigidaire is ranked as one of the best, I did not hesitate to purchase this French Door Counter-Depth Frigidaire. Just by look alone, the french door concept is the way to go for any family. There is no need to bend down constantly looking for product when using the original style top freezer design fridges. I am 100 percent glad I went with the french door, and have no hesitation recommended everyone look into this type of space saving design. Bottom line. A+ design and quality. The sizing is perfect for any home. Take a look at the picture I uploaded and get a sense of the beauty that will soon be yours.

reviews.title: Great features
reviews.review_text: The appearance: the change from a white fridge to a silver/grey is aesthetically pleasing Inside: the openness - the ability to quickly see where things are - the awesome storage options on the two doors the depth is good - things aren't lost at the back or timely to dig out, a problem with my old fridge The fridge operates quietly and efficiently. However, it doesn't have as much storage space in the two crispers as my previous fridge and as a nutritionally motivated individual, this is an area that I rely upon.

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed that I had such a small space to work with in my new kitchen. I was really hoping to avoid a 30 inch fridge and found this slightly bigger Frigidaire. I was pleasantly surprised by the layout in both the fridge and freezer components. This fridge is a very good option, if you're working with a small opening

reviews.title: Great appliance!
reviews.review_text: We bought ours a month ago for our new house and we love it! From the layout of the shelves keeping everything organized and easily accessible so nothing gets left at the back to go bad, to the convenient 3 drawer freezer with ice maker. Great choice for sure!

reviews.title: Working great and looks great too.
reviews.review_text: We have had the Frigidaire fridge for about one month. It is working great and the interior layout makes for good visibility of your items. I love the different drawers in the freezer compartment and the ice maker is working well. The fingerprint free surface is great for nice clean look on the exterior.

reviews.title: Fine
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge because it was one of only three fridges that fit the space allotted. I am very disappointed that a manual was included. I tried to obtain one online but got lost in the maze of websites. It has a ice maker which I have no idea about, nor how to install it. If you actually read this review please send me a manual.

reviews.title: Perfect for our small kitchen
reviews.review_text: We purchased our fridge just over a week ago. We were loving everything about it until yesterday when we noticed the clear drawers in the freezer section were getting a fine film of frost on them. The temperature was set at zero so we lowered it to -2 degrees and today the frost has gone!

reviews.title: Great deal
reviews.review_text: Perfect size for my kitchen. Doors swing nice and close great. Shelves are easy to install and adjust. The controls are simple and easy to see. The freezer is a nice size and the drawer is a nice feature. The ice machine is compact and the perfect size for my application. Nice fridge and great price!

reviews.title: New fridge
reviews.review_text: I purchased this refrigerator a month ago and have nothing but good to say about it. The size is perfect for me, being counter depth and with excellent shelf placement options and large door shelving. But the selling feature for me was the layout of the freezer with multiple drawers to maximize the space access, along with the ice cube maker and tray.

reviews.title: I Love our new Refrigerator...Fantastic Choice
reviews.review_text: This is the first Frigidaire I have ever purchased. We purchased it for about 1 month ago. It fit perfectly, looks great and works extremely well. We love the LED lighting and the large doors along with the large freeze compartment located at the bottom. I am sold on this refrigerator and would highly recommend it to others.

reviews.title: Fridge works well, but beware very short power cord
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge a little over a month ago and it has been working really well. My biggest complaint is that the power cord is very short. If you need to pull out your fridge because it is in a close out on both sides, you can't without removing the side wall/close out. Every other fridge I have owned has at least 1.5X longer power cord. It is a little small inside (not very deep) especially if you don't utilize the door storage. There is no light in the freezer area, but it's something you can get used to. Freezer area space is also pretty limited by the ice maker taking up space in the top left corner and the ice catcher. All that said, it is working well, fairly quiet and seemingly reliable if the power cord length is not an issue for your kitchen set up

reviews.title: Excellent for counter depth and limited width!
reviews.review_text: The self closing door feature stops the door about 5 inches away then if you push slightly on the door it will close on it's own from there. The flipper mullion will occasionally hit the adjacent door when closing if you don't flip it back a bit further manually. The compressor has a loud cycle that runs for a short time a few times a day. Nice looking unit, easy to access, great interior lighting, practical shelf location adjustments to suit our needs, big milk jug shelves on the door are great although it's a bit tricky to get them into the lower middle position, dual crispers are easy to access, the multiple freezer drawers make it easy to manage the contents, ice maker is handy. I haven't stopped and gave it a hug yet. Overall great product.

reviews.title: Best Chill Appliance
reviews.review_text: I needed to replace my refrigerator quickly. The Frigidaire - 17.6 Cu. Ft. Counter-Depth French Door Refrigerator was the perfect fit for my small space, yet gives me all the room I need for food storage. Love the clear bins and three-drawer freezer with ice-maker. French doors make easy access in a narrow galley kitchen.

reviews.title: Useful space
reviews.review_text: We love our new fridge space. Having compartments in both door allows you to organize your space so effectively. Sesame open up. Everything can be put in the right place and is easy to access. The lighting is also very good. The freezer compartment is also very functional. I highly recommend this model.

reviews.title: 17.6 Cu. Ft. Counter-Depth French Door Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge freezer after my previous Frigidaire packed in (after 22 years!). The appliance is a huge upgrade on our previous fridge freezer! I particularly like ease of use and the energy efficiency. Everything is so easy to reach in the fridge and freezer. We have recommended the appliance to our friends.

reviews.title: Nice fridge
reviews.review_text: Love the look of it but I find the shelves and the door bins fragile, makes me question the durability. It's not very large inside compared to the previous one we owned so we have to get used to that. I love the french door concept, helps seeing everything easily and not lose food as much as we use to. Like that the freezer contains so many drawers which helps with organizing but no light in freezer. We haven't connected the ice maker yet so can't comment on that at this point. Overall I'm happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Great fridge, love that it's counter depth, lots of space inside and awesome icemaker!
reviews.review_text: The bad news was I had to replace my fridge last month but the good news is I got this great new fridge. Lots of space inside; I thought I'd miss not having a meat drawer however it's been totally fine. The produce drawers are large, the shelves are really easy to configure and there is a ton of space in the door shelves. I was a bit suprised there isn't a light in the freezer drawer however I really like the multi drawers and the icemaker.

reviews.title: Perfect Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: We are extremely pleased with our new refrigerator. Having the refrigerator part on the top half of the unit is so convenient with the freezer part on the bottom part. Really enjoying this feature of the refrigerator. Double French doors are also very convenient to open and close. Freezer compartment is spacious and we especially like the compartment (drawer) configuration. The appearance of the refrigerator is stunning. Overall, we are very satisfied with our purchase of this appliance. Thank you Frigidaire.

reviews.title: Fridge is good....but has some major drawbacks, kind of cheaped out
reviews.review_text: Many things I do not like, and was unaware when shopping for a new fridge until it was delivered. First off, the left door spring does not close and BANGS into the right side door. Secondly, really dislike LED lights, not a good look. Thirdly, THERE IS NO LIGHT IN THE FREEZER COMPARTMENT. WHO DOES THIS???? I need a flashlight at night to find anything. This brand is not what it used to be.....user documentation is either missing or cannot find it.

reviews.title: Very nice design and works great!
reviews.review_text: This refrigerator has great features and works great. I love the freezer at the bottom and the French doors as it allows me to open the refrigerator doors and not interfere with an island we have in the way. I just wish it would come equipped with a deli/meat drawer.

reviews.title: Frigidaire Fridge
reviews.review_text: I bought my fridge 3 months ago and since then I have been enjoying it. So far it is working perfectly.

reviews.title: refrigerator frfg1723av
reviews.review_text: I bought this refrigerator a month ago and really like it. The web site is total crap. I have not been able to get a single answer for any question that I have asked. Cannot even use the user manual without buying it.

reviews.title: Very pleased!
reviews.review_text: We love t this fridge. It fits like a glove in the space and still has tons of room for everything. Keeping it clean has not been an issue. Would reccomend!

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.review_text: I have had this fridge for less then 6 months and the ice maker is not working. Still waiting for a repair man to come under the warranty. Been waiting over 3 weeks so far!

reviews.title: No manual
reviews.review_text: The refrigerator didn't come with a detailed manual, and I have no idea how to make changes in the software. The door shelves were difficult to install, so we didn't put them in for fear of breaking them.

reviews.title: Beautiful design
reviews.review_text: This fridge provides ample space and organization. If you have a small kitchen you will definitely appreciate the slimmer profile of this fridge. Also enjoying the ice maker!

reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
reviews.review_text: Bought this unit for our park model and love the fit and the features! The ice maker is awesome. Would have given it a five star rating but have had some food freezing at the back of fridge when temperature is set at recommended setting.

reviews.title: Super satisfied!
reviews.review_text: It's first time I bought Frigidaire Product. It looks nice, and More function. My wife and my family are very satisfied about this new refrigerator

reviews.title: Very nice refrigerator
reviews.review_text: Keeps true to temperature. The ice maker is a good addition. The size works well in our kitchen. My only reason for 4 stars is I wish it had a meat and cheese drawer.

reviews.title: Works well but issues
reviews.review_text: The ice maker is incredibly loud, the door compartments dont fit properly and constantly fall off. The fridge has to be a maximum setting yo ensure s normal cool for the fridge. Looks great though

reviews.title: Appreciate the size and functionality!
reviews.review_text: I've had the fridge for a couple of weeks and so far, so good! It works as it should and looks great. It's easy to see, organize and reach for everything. Very satisfied so far.

reviews.title: Sleek space saver!
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy with this fridge. It is saving significant space in my kitchen and looks great. For me, there is ample fridge space and I like the freezer organization. The ice maker is a nice bonus.

reviews.title: that's the ticket
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] was looking for something to fit specific height constraints and this fridge got the job done. just going off the specs, it would seem to have less capacity than others but that is deceiving. plenty of space for the fresh stuff. pitch the moldy stuff. not gonna eat it anyway. discipline baby. discipline.

reviews.title: Functionality
reviews.review_text: Love that this model does not have water and ice through the door, just an ice maker in the freezer portion.

reviews.title: Great fridge!
reviews.review_text: Very nice fridge with lots of storage. Love the French doors. The ice maker in the bottom freezer makes the perfect ice.

reviews.title: Excellent upgrade
reviews.review_text: Got this fridge and it has been a very worth while upgrade. Bigger fridge and freezer than last one 100% would recommend

reviews.title: Bang for buck.
reviews.review_text: Searched around and same price at all retailers which generally means a good product. Great space and size for what we needed.

reviews.title: So loud!
reviews.review_text: When this refrigerator is cooling, there is a relatively loud noise from some kind of fan. Far louder than my old fridge. Because I have a small apartment this fridge is far too loud for me. What a disappointment.

reviews.title: Cupboard depth perfect
reviews.review_text: We just installed this and it has made our kitchen beautiful. This fridge had the perfect cupboard depth we needed:: as we have a pantry door next to it and needed this size for the drawers to pull out.

reviews.title: So far so good!
reviews.review_text: Two months in. The cools were oughta and freezes where it should. I really like the dim to bright light when you open the door. Classy. I don't know. It's a fridge. It works.

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: I have had this fridge for a couple of weeks. It is surprisingly roomy and holds everything I need it to. Very quiet which is an improvement from my last fridge.

reviews.title: Cute and Cold
reviews.review_text: All in all, a very nice looking fridge that keeps my cold food cold and my frozen food frozen. It's a little small, but for my purposes as a single person, it will probably do just fine.

reviews.title: Great features!
reviews.review_text: It has lots of space, a great ice maker and a good size freezer. I especially love that the stainless steel finish hardly shows any fingerprints and it's super easy to clean!

reviews.title: Compact but holds a lot!
reviews.review_text: I bought this 4 months ago and am very happy with it. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because I miss having a small cheese/deli meats drawer and a butter holder. Other than that I love it!

reviews.title: Great Fridge so far
reviews.review_text: Only about a month of use so far and it works great. One small thing that could be better though. The left side door seal thing doesnt retract enough sometimes and it hits the right side door. Not sure if theres any adjustment necessary

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.review_text: Our Frigidaire is working as it should. I like the bright light inside and the ease of grabbing stuff since I don't have to bend low to find things. Very happy with it so far.

reviews.title: Great fridge!
reviews.review_text: We have had this fridge since July. It has been great. I love how much space it has. The only thing I don't love is the middle bracket sometimes gets stuck so you have to make sure to close the one side before the other.

reviews.title: Best small fridge
reviews.review_text: Bought this fridge to fit a very small kitchen and the organization and layout in fridge and freezer is amazing. Way more flexibility and actual space inside than my previous fridge.

reviews.title: Great purchase exceeded expectation
reviews.review_text: This fridge has exceeded our expectations and does exactly what it s designed to do. The shelves are deep and it's bright. The only thing I wished it has was a light in the freezer compartment other than that it's great.

reviews.title: Nice Size
reviews.review_text: Bought this refrigerator 5-months ago and enjoy the layout and size. Not too big but with the features we need especially ice maker. Fits nicely as counter depth with built in cabinets. So far so good!

reviews.title: Sleek lines
reviews.review_text: Our new fridge fit perfectly into the small space galley kitchen. An added bonus is the counter depth, I doesn't seem like much, but it prides for a little more space. The sleek lines are a nice touch which also help keep in clean.

reviews.title: Decent fridge
reviews.review_text: The distribution doesn't seem ideal compared to our old fridge of the same size. It's more difficult to organize our food. However, it's a decent fridge for the price.

reviews.title: Excellent storage for size.
reviews.review_text: We bought this fridge a month ago, so far I am really impressed with the amount of storage it has for its size. I also really like the layout of the freezer.

reviews.title: Great refrigerator for the money
reviews.review_text: So happy with our Frigidaire purchase last month. Having the refrigerator up high and freezer below is a bonus and getting used to the French doors. So much more space and easy to find things. I recommend this Frigidaire.

reviews.title: Perfect size for our kitchen..
reviews.review_text: Choosing a new refrigerator these days is a big decision. This Frigidaire met all our requirements and was installed with no issues by our dealer. This is the first refrigerator we bought after 25 yrs. Love the new modern features.

reviews.title: Enjoy the features and size
reviews.review_text: Bought approx month ago. So far its been great. The flash freeze when putting new items into the freezer part is great. The upper fridge section is roomy, easy to see everything. We really like the fact the temperature is shown on the side.

reviews.title: Enjoying our purchase
reviews.review_text: We purchased this product a few weeks ago when our 23 year old fridge said enough!!! This is the first french door we have had and seems so much roomier than the old one and it is a first time having an ice maker which I am truley enjoying. Very happy with our purchase and will concider Frigidaire in the near future to replace the other appliances.

reviews.title: Brand new fridge took way too long!
reviews.review_text: It took weeks for the fridge to show up after I ordered it. Now it is freezing all my food and the earliest I can get a tech to even look at it is almost another 3 weeks. Once they look at it, are they going to tell me I need to wait another 3 weeks for it to be fixed? Honestly, this has been a very disappointing purchase.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: The fridge seems to be doing its job. Only had it for a few weeks now. A few down sides... freezer is on the small side and there is also no light in the freezer. The crisper on the right isn't able to open unless both doors are open. But on the upside. The boost freeze is handy, extra freeze mode after you go shopping. The fridge is wide open, lots of space and the led lights are so bright

reviews.title: Great Update for the Kitchen!
reviews.review_text: I just update the last of my appliances with this fridge purchase. It goes in a small space, fits well and looks great. I just hope it lasts, so I cannot speak to life span, as it did replace a 22 yr old fridge. It is certainly quiet and roomy. I am not using the ice maker so by turning that off, it made it even quieter. It arrived with shelves in the freezer, this was easy to put together. The drawers in the freezer are well made. The lightening in frdige is exceptional.

reviews.title: Great fridge so far!
reviews.review_text: Had this fridge for almost a month and so far it's been doing what it was built to do. Perfect for a small kitchen and functional in terms of compartments layout. Love the 3 different compartments in the freezer section as it allows to organize things better. No issues with noise or temperature, works perfect.

reviews.title: Great fridge so far.
reviews.review_text: Its always a gamble when you buy appliances today, but so far the fridge is awesome! The only thing is i wish they mentioned that the compressor runs all the time due to the fact its a variable speed. Also it would be a plus if the compressor wassnt as loud.

reviews.title: Really like the layout
reviews.review_text: We live in a rural area with the closest store about 100 km away - so our fridge is often really full because we cannot "just pop out to the store" if we need something! I find the layout of the fridge excellent - I can fit lots of stuff in it and everything is easily visible. The freezer is good too. Ice machine works great! Very pleased with our purchase.

reviews.title: I LOOOOVE IT!!! 100% RECOMMENDED!!!
reviews.review_text: I bought this in July 2024 after having a bad experience with a new Whirlpool refrigerator. I bought a brand new Whirlpool refrigerator in July 2024 but as soon as I plugged it in, I regretted the purchase since it was making a very loud and annoying low bass-like noise. Also the surface of the stainless steel doors of the Whirlpool refrigerator already had issues - it was already having unremovable stains. So I was super disappointed and couldn't keep it. I had to return the Whirlpool refrigerator. Then I researched and purchased a new Frigidaire fridge and OMG, this is soooo quiet, and beautiful!! Every single detail of this fridge is so well-made and this is AMAAAAZING!!! I'm super happy that I got this!!!

reviews.title: Great features!
reviews.review_text: Very happy with this fridge. It's not as deep as the bigger models so I can actually reach the back!! And having so many drawers in the freezer is a bonus for storage!! I'm in my 70s and a widow, So don't require the capacity of the larger fridges.

reviews.title: Simple!
reviews.review_text: I wanted a counter depth fridge and I'm Very happy I stuck to my guns. It fits way better than my old non counter depth fridge. I chose this model because I hate too many frills on a fridge. I want it to be easy and quick to clean so it can stay clean. This simple interior design is perfect, 3 large shelves that go from side to side. The only downside that isnt really a downside in there are only 2 crispers. So I added my own clear plastic basket to just help organize things. The doors hold quite a bit more than what they look like they hold. Exterior is quick to clean with soap and water and finger prints come right off. Not bad for too many fingers prints either. The freezer is compartmentalized which I love. I have a bigger freezer so now I can keep everything organized that I use more frequently in this freezer and no exactly where to look for an item. This fridge says in the specs that it is smaller than my last fridge but because of the way it's laid out it is actually bigger, I have way more room. I am extremely satisfied with this fridge and would 100% buy it again!

reviews.title: Great fridge with great freezer organization.
reviews.review_text: We bought this fridge roughly a month ago and so far we are very happy with it. We love the drawers in the freezer as they provide additional organization. In comparison to a 33 or 36 inch fridge this fridge seems very small but it stores a lot! We thought at first we may regret not getting a bigger fridge but we always have free space available.

reviews.title: Well organized food compartments. Spacious.
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge a couple weeks ago to replace my old side-by-side fridge. Can't believe how much space there is both in the fridge and freezer sections. I love my new Frigidaire fridge. Great design. Now I'm inspired to repaint my kitchen!

reviews.title: Great fridge for a busy household!
reviews.review_text: We purchased this fridge a month ago and we are very happy with it! It's spacious, and fits more than our old fridge about the same size. Placement of the shelves and compartments makes sense. We have two teenaged boys who are very active with sports, so it gets used A LOT! I like that the doors close automatically, and the lights turn off if it's open for too long. Set up was super easy! In the end, we opted to not hook up the ice maker, as we did find it a bit loud when it was first turned on (no different than all other fridges with ice makers). I like that we have the option to turn it on/off. Really happy with this purchase!!

reviews.title: Good use of space for a compact size
reviews.review_text: Got this to replace another Frigidaire that is going elsewhere in the house. Love the French door design compared to a single door. The decreased depth makes my tiny kitchen feel a lot more spacious. A little bit noisier than my old one but nothing overwhelming.

reviews.title: Great refrigerator
reviews.review_text: Our original fridge was an LP. Worked pretty good for 10 years, although made a lot of funny noises. Decided to give up during a heat wave. Called a couple of places and no one apparently works on LP's. anyway decided to go with a frididaire as they are a name that's been around forever and the ratings were good. So far so good, it's working great and no funny noises. Lol

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: We love this refrigerator, especially with the many shelves on the doors and the ample crisper space for vegetables and fruits. The ice maker is an added bonus along with the three drawers of freezer space. The only issue we have had with the drawer containing the ice maker keeps slipping off the track. This can be quite annoying and really shouldn't be happening with a refrigerator that is only three months old.

reviews.title: Love this new fridge!
reviews.review_text: It's been about a month since we bought our new fridge. I love the depth of it and the features it has. The depth allows you to see everything inside easily so things don't get lost at the back. The side shelves are perfect in size. I also love that unlike stainless steel, it doesn't have finger prints!!

reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
reviews.review_text: I've owned the fridge for a few weeks now and I love it. It was hard to find a fridge that fit the space but this one does perfectly. It looks good, the temperature is stable (nothing freezes in the fridge portion), and it's quiet. My only issue is the French doors - the left door has a folding flap that sometimes hits the other door. I don't know if I'm accidentally moving it to cause this, but a few times I've hit the other door and had to adjust the flap to get the door closed. The other issue is that the doors need to be pushed closed - you can't let them glide closed on their own. Overall I'm happy with my purchase, I just wish the doors were engineered a bit better.

reviews.title: A good fridge for 2-3 people
reviews.review_text: So far so good, this fridge has a nice layout to it the only downside is when you open the right door only you can't pull out the right crisper drawer because the seal between the doors gets in the way, but if you open the left door only you can open the left crisper drawer. Just a design feature not fully thought out. We do love how bright the lighting is inside when we are trying to find something and it definitely keeps our food fresher longer compared to our other fridge.

reviews.title: Looks sharp and fits!
reviews.review_text: So far loving this fridge. My old one was a side by side that was too long for the space. I searched high and low for a fridge to fit cupboards that are 69 inches from the floor and counter depth. This was the one. It has lots of space and we love the ice maker.

reviews.title: Love everything about this fridge

Overall I am more than happy with this fridge.

reviews.title: Good fridge for empty nesters.
reviews.review_text: This is a replacement fridge because the first one arrived with dented stainless steel doors due to shipping damage. It is definitely much quieter than the damaged one, which is a relief because I live in an open concept condo. Having said that, I find the ice maker to be loud. My previous refrigerator only made noise when ice cubes fell into the storage tray.The size is adequate for our requirements, but it may be too small for a family. But I do have a concern. When we open the freezer drawer, both refrigerators make a clunking noise that makes us think something has broken. I'm not sure what that is, but hopefully Frigidaire will address it. Overall, I am pleased with this model.

reviews.title: Piece of garbage
reviews.review_text: Have had this for less than 2 years, bought brand new when we bought our home. Outside of the manufacturer's warranty, and a whole bunch of issues wrong with it in the last day where it's no longer cooling correctly and the ice maker stopped working. Having a repair service come out today and looking like we will be halfway to the cost of a new refrigerator just in the repairs alone. Best believe I will not be going to a Frigidaire refrigerator again and I will be telling any of my family and friends who are looking at getting some type of new refrigerator appliance to avoid Frigidaire at all costs. Having a service come out and look at it to see how much the repairs are going to be, but based on what people have said, we are probably looking at being halfway to a new refrigerator just in repairs to keep this 2-year-old refrigerator alive

reviews.review_text: We owned many refrigerators throughout the years and this one is a disappointment. Ice maker froze up within the first few months of delivery. The freeze door make a loud popping noise as it seems to stick slightly every once in a while. Again we decided to live with this issue. Now that we are six months out of warranty the ice maker has completely stopped working. It is not even trying to cycle like it did when the internal water line was frozen.

reviews.title: We had to have Frifidaire Appliance in our new home!!
reviews.review_text: We added an addition to our farm property many years ago and it included a new kitchen and dining area. With the new addition, it was decided to purchase new appliances and after much research, we chose Fidgidaire appliances: fridge, stove, diswasher, and microwave and never had issues with any of them. We were just talking to the new owners, and they also have had no issues with our appliances. 7 years ago, we sold our farm and moved to a smaller property. It was exactly what we were looking for execpt one thing. The appliances were not Frigidaire. Slowly over the years we have replaced all of them with Frigidaire products, and our last purchase was our Frigidaire frigde. Looking forward to many years of awesome products and reliabity.

reviews.title: Wife is Very Happy -- So I appreciate it. Probably Saved My Life
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Once upon a time, we owned another refrigerator brand that was, shall we say, uniquely engineered to test the boundaries of our patience. Picture this: my previously tranquil wife, transformed into an ice-breaking warrior, wielding an ice pick to combat the glacier forming in our freezer. My wife, with an ice pick in her hand—yes, that was a scene straight out of a suspense thriller. Fast forward to our current culinary masterpiece, and it's a different story. This unit is not just a pretty face; it's a marvel of efficiency. It's so quiet that I had to double-check it was running and not just posing as a refrigerator. And let's talk about the lighting—brighter than my future after I stopped the daily ice pick adventures. It's practically a mini disco in there every time I open the door, without the outdated 70s music. I'm not just impressed; I'm in love (with the fridge, that is).

reviews.title: Tons of Space!!
reviews.review_text: I finally got rid of my side by side for this terrific French door fridge. I can't believe how much stuff it holds. It was also the only one that maintained the height of my old fridge which has cabinets above. Almost all the new ones were too tall and I did not want to get new cabinets because I needed a new fridge.

Others also said the freezer drawer is loud when you open it- It is somewhat, more so if you are ripping it open really fast. It's not really an issue for me though, I don't notice it much anymore. Overall seems to be a nice fridge.

reviews.title: Quiet Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We previously had a Maytag refrigerator and also a Whirlpool refrigerator, but this Frigidaire refrigerator is the quietest by far and it works great. One word of advice to anyone else that owns this appliance - if you're not getting any ice from the ice maker, then try setting the refrigerator (top part) to 37 degrees (if the refrigerator section is too cold, it may prevent ice from being made down below).

The thing I hate about it is the cheesy curved door handles. The whole front is slightly curved. It makes it ugly and cheap looking but it fit the space and was half the price of the one I really liked. It works though. No water maker. Ice cubes are adorable. Little squares. Like jumbo dice. Really perfect actually.

reviews.title: Very Nice Fridge
reviews.review_text: We needed a new fridge ASAP, as our old one (different brand) stopped working. This Frigidaire was the closest thing to what we were looking for, that our local appliance store had in stock. We are very happy we ended up with this unit. We really like the counter-depth design, as it doesn't intrude into the kitchen. The doors close firmly, which is a big upgrade from our previous brand. The fit and finish are great and it looks good. The included ice maker works great. It makes small, squarish ice cubes. If only they had made the ice bucket a bit bigger. But, that is a small complaint for a great refrigerator.
