reviews.title: It's great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We were looking for a fridge that would fit in a galley kitchen and this one is perfect. It's roomy yet does not take up as much room as others. Easy to use controls. Overall a great product for our situation.

reviews.title: Nice looking - good storage
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a modern, clean appliance which really works in any space. Despite being “counter depth”, it actually has a lot of space on the inside. We bought this for our condo in Maui. Like other reviewers have said, I wish that there was a light in the freezer compartment. Also, would be very nice to have a water dispenser, but I guess that's not a feature included at this price point. Overall happy.

reviews.title: Love this fridge
reviews.review_text: So far Im really happy with this fridge. Love the fact that I don't have to bend over to look into the fridge anymore. The freezer is a little harder to get used to but love that it is as cold as my chest freezers. We haven't hooked up the ice maker yet and it is a bit hard to put ice cube trays into a drawer so I'm thinking we will hook it up soon.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love my new fridge! It got cold very quickly. I have enough space for anything I need to keep cold. Shelving is easy to adjust, it's well lit and everything is reachable. Glad I decided on Frigidaire!

reviews.title: Questioning!!
reviews.review_text: Bought this fridge 7 months ago. On page 15 it says that after 5 minutes of the fridge door being opened that there is an alarm that goes off. Apparently, there is no alarm! Tried getting it fixed, still no go. Don't know if there will ever be a resolution.

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Fits our difficult spot- counter depth. Nice interior space. The sides are not stainless - and are visible- so that was a disappointment. The black sides look okay, but we thought they would be the same as the front.

reviews.title: French door fridge FRFG1723AV
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We have a small space for the fridge, and really wanted the freezer below the fridge. It was hard to find but this fits the bill. It looks nice. The only thin i would change is more flexibility on the shelves. They go across the while fridge and i would prefer that the shelves be adjustable independently on each side of the french door.

reviews.title: Perfect fit
reviews.review_text: Just love the fridge. It fits perfectly in my space. There is a lot of room with the baskets on the door and the freezer holds more than expected. I did not attach the ice cube maker as it is not essential to me. I really like that you can open a single door and leave the other closed. No more bending down for the vegetable drawer throughout the day. I have already recommended it to a friend. It is very quiet and have had no problems at all.

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We like this fridge because of the roomy freezer on the bottom and the easy access to both sides of the fridge. We also like the size of the ice cubes and don't want to have to deal with a messy water dispenser on the outside of the fridge.

reviews.title: Crap!
reviews.review_text: Bought one April/22. Had to return and had to get another. Should have bought something else at this point. Four months later, freezer not working and leaking coolant. I have been without a fridge now for 3 weeks and living out of a cooler. Parts on back order and no ETA. I want my money back! No stars if I could!

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] One of the best features of this refrigerator is the size fix perfect in my kitchen. The inside is spacious and the fridge has different compartments to storages of all types of frozen foods. The quality is excellent. The only thing that I dislike is a sounds that it makes sometimes when is charging.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We had an older LG refrigerator that died and purchased this one and couldn't be happier. The design is very user friendly with adequate space for everything you need. The filters are easy to change and work very well. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.title: Perfect fridge for my small kitchen
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like my new French door refrigerator! I previously had a side by side, but find this fridge has a lot more room on top. It is a lot easier to see all my items and I don't need to bend down to find the vegetables at the bottom. I also really like the counter depth size. I now have more room in my small kitchen and it looks so much neater. The ice maker is convenient inside the freezer; I did have the outside water and ice dispenser on my old fridge, but this is fine and less complicated. It is also very quiet; I don't hear any noise except when new ice cubes are being made.

reviews.title: My dream French Door Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: My house only has a limited space for a refrigerator, but this refrigerator fits perfectly in my small space. My old refrigerator worked for over 20 years, so I've been looking for a french door refrigerator for a long time and finally found the perfect size. It's been two weeks since I started using this refrigerator, and the sound like a calm sea. The door pockets and inside of fridge are easy to use, the thermometer indicates it so I feel safe. The freezer is easy to use with drawers. There is no lighting in the freezer, but since it is a drawer type, it can be seen well with the lighting of the kitchen. Thank you for making this fridge. I appreciate Frigidaire.

reviews.title: Great size
reviews.review_text: Having a small space to fill , our choices were limited. This fridge with its counter depth fit the bill nicely. We are happy with our purchase thus far. The only reason we are not giving it a 5/5 is the lack of light in the freezer and that it was not available in black stainless steel.

reviews.title: Well Done
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge, when i moved into my new house to me... well lited, offers plenty of space for my needs, One feature i really like is the somehow coated stainless steel finish that does not magnetize your finger print, it's real easy to keep clean. A friend has the full depth model, and that is what inspired me to buy this one, Her comments were very positive

reviews.title: Pretty and functional
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We needed a fridge to put in a built-in area was somewhat difficult. I was so thankful that Frigidaire had one that wasn't as tall as all the rest. We needing something under 70 inches is not popular today. So I was thankful when I found this Frigidaire to fit my space.

reviews.title: French door refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this refrigerator, with getting older it was getting harder and harder to squat down to see what was on the lower shelf. Now it is so easy to see where things are. If I had to do it again I would find, one with only 1 pull-out on the freezer sections. The only other thing is that there is no manual that came with the fridge.

reviews.title: Happy customers
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We were in desperate need of a new fridge and had been looking but couldn't find one for the space, plus I wanted the same brand as my range Frigidaire! Finally found this one and we are very happy. I do wish dat

reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
reviews.review_text: We loved the sleek look of this french door fridge. The space in the freezer and ice-marker is very cool! Our only complaint… the small dents in both the left & right doors. We haven't had this fridge for less than a month and we have dents. Apparently there is only a 7 day window to report any defects. We are less than a month and we are extremely sad. If you purchase this until, double check everything. Other than that, it's a wonderful fridge & freezer.

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: We bought the fridge two weeks ago. So far so good. The fridge is spacious and what we like about the bottom freezer it has 3 drawers. We bought this brand as we also have the same brand as our old fridge that we replaced due to age. And has no problems at all since we moved into our house 12 years ago.

reviews.title: Counter depth beauty
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I just received my frig yesterday and am impressed with the quality for the price. My only concern is it has been 18 hours and I still don't have any ice. I am holding out hope because I really like this frig.

reviews.title: Perfect for my space
reviews.review_text: I bought this a a few months ago because it was recommended to me as being a reliable brand that is serviceable where I live. It took me a bit to figure out the ice maker as the instructions were not clear and I have never had one before. I like the filters they come with as well as the well thought out shelving on the doors. I wish it would have come with the ice cube water line kit as I had to go buy one from the local building supply store.

reviews.title: It's got nice features
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] There's are some areas I really like- the multiple layers within the freezer, the ice maker, the bright lights in the fridge. Things I don't like: no light in the freezer, not enough baskets in the fridge, the fruit and veggie crisper baskets are small. This fridge is supposed to be larger than the one we had, but it actually feels smaller. Some small improvements could really make this a nice fridge.

reviews.title: Perfect Size for Our Space
reviews.review_text: The French Doors make our lives great, as we have a wall right across from our fridge. We also had a small space, so the counter depth fits in so great. We don't love the crispers for keeping veggies stiffer, but we can work around that for our needs. Definitely liking the new fridge.

reviews.title: So far, so good
reviews.review_text: We bought this fridge 3 months ago after ours stopping working. We knew we wanted stainless steel, French doors and the freezer on the bottom. This fridge hit all those points and the price was good. We got the ice maker option in the freezer but haven't hooked it up yet. Pros: -It's quiet -Spacious -Bright interior light -Love having the freezer on the bottom -Fingerprint resistant -The freezer drawer set up is perfect for us Cons: -You have to be careful closing the French doors because one side should close first and if you forget the bar hits the other door -Sometimes I think the plastic freezer drawers are going to break if I'm not gentle enough opening and closing

reviews.title: Spacious fridge
reviews.review_text: Love this fridge. A lot of research was done and in spite of a salesman trying to after me away from counter depth, I went with my preference. I have space limitations due to older home. It has so much space and yes, you can fit a Brita water jug in the bottom shelf. . Lots of space in this fridge and freezer all at a glance.

reviews.title: Beautiful appliance with more capacity than you think!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this refridgerator more than I thought I would. My first time with the freezer on the bottom. It definitely takes some getting used to. The refridgerator part is really spacious. Plenty of space and very easy to locate everything. The only thing I wish it had is a draw for meat and cheese.

reviews.title: Love everything about this fridge!
reviews.review_text: Had the fridge for a couple months now and the biggest thing I'm impressed with is the crisper drawers. The new design is amazing and the produce does last longer. The bottom freezer is not to bad - I only wish there was a light in there but overall, the size of the fridge is exactly what we needed.

reviews.title: Love the new fridge
reviews.review_text: We need a smaller fridge to fit in our condo, and were very pleased to find one with french doors that fits the space as there are very few options available. The design of the interior works well and feels more spacious than the previous fridge that was actually larger (too large.) The ice cubes are smaller than "standard" which we like. Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.title: More space than you'd think for 17.6 Cu Ft.
reviews.review_text: We didn't have a lot of choice because of the space we had to fit our fridge into. We've had it for around a year and we're very happy with it. I just recently hooked up the waterline, and having a constant supply of ice from the ice maker is a nice treat!

reviews.title: Great Little Fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Would have given this 5 stars, but took off a star due to limited arrangements of shelves. Other than that, I love it! Great little fridge for the price. Love the fingerprint resistant stainless. Looks great and keeps temperatures level in both the fridge and freezer. Although the freezer space is compact, it is layed out well...No digging to find items. Not thrilled with the lack of door bin placement spots, but overall a solid buy.

reviews.title: Form, Function and an Ideal Fit
reviews.review_text: We consider ourselves fortunate to have found this great refrigerator. We were looking for the convenience of French doors (check) and counter-depth (check) to fit within a precise existing space (check). Clean lines outside and thoughtful storage design inside make this an excellent choice for us. Got it on sale too.

reviews.title: Fridge Review
reviews.review_text: I porchased this fridge after completing a kitchen remodel. I'm very satisfied with it. Plusses are that it fit! I needed a unit with similar handles to my existing appliances and counter depth was a must Height was also an issue. This ticked those boxes. Freezer drawers are nicely sized and functional. Cons. Although the ice maker is awesome, would of liked a water dispenser - even an internal side spout to reduce space consumption. Lighting in the freezer would have been a plus also.

reviews.title: Very Nice Fridge
reviews.review_text: We looked for a fridge for our condo limited space. There are many out there but this one fit perfectly. It may say 17.6 cubic ft. but it has more room than our other fridge that was 18.5 cubic ft. The freezer is amazing with all the drawers keeps everything orderly "nice" People gave this fridge a lesser rating because there is no light in the freezer two things one don't buy it than and second turn the kitchen light on. This fridge runs very quietly and we are very happy with our purchase. Thanks Frigidaire

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This was a perfect fit in my small kitchen. I enjoy the fact that I don't have to search the bottom of the fridge for veggies only to find that the gone bad because I could not see them. This is a great buy

reviews.title: Haikus are easy, but sometimes they don't make sense, refrigerator...
reviews.review_text: Great fridge. Well lit. Purchased the fridge a month ago. So far so good. Last one was a 2011 model making loud noises. Same manufacturer. This one makes quieter noises, and seems to have better regulation/control over the compressor. Nice clean lines, easy install. Good handles. Magnetic surface despite stainless steel finish is a bonus. The finish does scratch with certain magnets fairly easily so those have been moved to the side of the fridge. Not sure how that can be avoided with a metal surface though. It is arranged well, though door shelves were a little tight to install, I am worried the plastic might break if I attempt to take them out and move around. So try to think about where to put them as you set up the door shelves. Doors all seem to have a good seal. The left door is the one with the... vertical flapper bar? that the right door rests on to make a seal in the middle, between the two doors. This flapper thing sometimes pops out a little far when you only open the left door and try to close it, hitting the right door. I sometimes have to poke the flapper to let the door close, not really a big deal but can be annoying. I hope that over time the flap will get worn-in and stop popping out as much. It does seem to be happening less over time. We'll see. The freezer drawer/door has a good seal. It makes kind of a loud pop whenever I open it. As the seal releases. Not sure how normal that is. Almost seems to be magnetically assisted when closing. But no issues so far. Hopefully good for another 250,000 pulls! The energy rating was an important factor in fridge selection. This one was a little better than most of the similar size. I have to admit, beyond spending a lot more for an ultra efficient fridge, they all seemed pretty similar in the price range. I liked that this unit actually had its energy rating easily visible on all the sites it was listed on. I like it. I would recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect size
reviews.review_text: We bought this fridge a few weeks ago and love it. With just the 2 of us it's the perfect size. Lots of room in the freezer with the 2 drawers plus basket, it's quiet and fits well in our small space. The only negative thing is the wires and hoses show at the back/side if you have an open side where your fridge sits.

reviews.title: Smaller refrigerator, good look
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a smaller refrigerator for older cabinet openings. The ice maker is inside the freezer. Only one type of cube that doesn't fit in some of my drink cups (swell). You need to open both doors to properly access the crispers. Ice will drop even though the door is open and the tray is pulled out. The capacity of the refrigerator is good even with the smaller size. The top door bins are easily adjustable, however I am unable to adjust the lower bins even though it looks like it's possible. Cannot find any info on this. I still like this refrigerator even with these quirks.

reviews.title: Small, French door refrigerator FRFG1723AV
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The FRFG1723AV refrigerator is a perfect fit for my small space, which required a <68” height. This was the only option I found in a stainless, French door style. The interior design maximizes storage space in both the refrigerator and freezer area. The price point was very reasonable, too. I'd highly recommend this model.

reviews.title: Great use of space
reviews.review_text: I bought this refrigerator a month ago to replace a 30" Whirlpool refrigerator which was brand new as well but didn't work well from day 1. The problem I had with the Whirlpool was that the temperature uniformity from one shelf to another varied greatly where the top shelf would be 44°F (which is not food safe, and the crisper drawers would be 30°F which would freeze my veggies. So I retired the Whirlpool and went with the Frigidaire and I'm so glad I did. The temperature uniformity with this fridge is excellent. The temperature is the same on every shelf and in the crisper drawers. The simple layout in the interior of this fridge is far better than the Whirlpool I returned and, even though the Frigidaire is smaller by 1.5 cuft there is actually more useable space in this fridge. This ice maker makes ice quickly, the interior light in the fridge is a nice cool color, and the outside of the fridge is sleek. Not to mention the door baskets are well constructed, sturdy, and have good storage space. The freezer is a good space and the addition of drawers inside the freezer is a nice addition which I wasn't sure if I would like but I love them. They are great for keeping meat, fish, etc from frozen fruit or bread and the ice being enclosed in a drawer is nice as well so it doesn't impart flavors from other foods in the freezer. The only thing I'd like to see from this fridge would be an internal water dispenser and a light in the freezer but these are minor issues. All in all I highly recommend this refrigerator. Especially if you are in need of a 30" refrigerator.

reviews.title: I don't hate
reviews.review_text: With all new models being the french door type (which I am not a fan of) it restricts the options when replacing an older, larger, single swing door fridge so this model was literally all we had to choose from. With that said, overall it is fine and works as a fridge should. There is a lot of space in the freezer. In the fridge part, the produce & fruit drawers are small and fit very little which means I have to keep a fair amount of my veg on the shelves, which I don't love. Could use a third drawer for cheese & deli. It is not the most efficient use of space.

reviews.title: Best Refrigerator Bang For the Buck..
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this gorgeous refrigerator/freezer! It's everything I wanted - spacious with lots of compartments to keep everything organized! It is just the right size for me, and I especially love the bottom freezer with 3 compartments and an ice maker! Finally, the French door design is exactly what I was looking for! Simply perfect!

reviews.title: Space is everything
reviews.review_text: Our old fridge died recently so we made a quick decision to buy this model based on its dimensions to fit into our narrow kitchen. This fridge is small (in a good way), easy to maneuver, and surprisingly lightweight. The top refrigerator unit is deep and wide with shelves to move around and deep door shelves to maximize. It's almost too much space which is not a bad thing! Temperature control is digital and easy to use for both the fridge and freezer underneath. Speaking of the freezer, it's bigger than you think it is at first glance. The main drawer fits everything perfectly where, in our old vertical freezer, took up so much space. But that's not all, the second drawer pulls out above the main drawer and has even more space and contains the easy-to-access ice maker with a scoop! The things that make me happy in my thirties... Anyway, there's also a third drawer that pulls out and I can't be more thankful for this design. You can pull out each drawer on its own and close them all together when you're finished. The whole unit runs fairly quietly. My only complaint is closing the left side door. There's a flap that locks into place when you close the left side first then the right. However, if you close the right first and then the left, the flap often stops you from closing the door without manually flattening it and closing it again. Startles me every time I don't close the fridge "properly." I'll get used to it. Overall, I'm so thankful for this unit.

reviews.title: Small Freezer, Quality Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Nice refrigerator space for a smaller refrigerator. Small freezer space means an additional freezer will be needed. Quality refrigerator. No lights in freezer, LED in refrigerator turn off after a few minutes. Challenge to get ice cube trays In freezer without spilling. Alot of rearranging of items. Not enough room for 2 people to have a variety of dinners, lunches, ice cream etc. Good for a single person who buys almost all fresh food only.

reviews.title: Beautiful Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have a very limited space kitchen. Upper cabinets are less than 70 inches above the floor. The Frigidaire 17.6 cu. ft. is the very best solution to the minimal space problem. The interior design of this refrigerator maximizes the usable space. The exterior is clean and beautiful.

reviews.title: Compact and Efficient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Overall, I really like it. I wish there were more freezer space but there is a lot of refrigerator space for the compact unit. Also, I wish it provided water, but I knew what I was getting and it fit the space I needed. Very nice looking.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great fridge for a small space. Would like to see a water dispenser option. Would also like a better user manual/install guide with the product. Had issues with install of fridge door bins and what turns out to be an ice scoop in ice bucket.

reviews.title: Good Fit
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's been hard to find a french door fridge that fits in my little space. This one does. It's pretty roomy and pretty quiet. The bottom freezer is convenient with three separate sections, even if it's a little clunky with the way it opens and closes. The main section is brightly lit and holds quite a bit.

reviews.title: Great Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great refrigerator! Much larger than my old side by side. Extremely quiet. Like the drawers in the freezer, again can fit more in this one than in my old side by side which was a bit bigger. Would recommend. My first Frigidaire so far so good!

reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This refrigerator is ideal for small kitchens, featuring a well-designed interior with easily adjustable shelves and sensor lights. The freezer has convenient organizers. I don't use the ice maker, because I don't have the water connection available.

reviews.title: Perfect for smaller spaces
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this for my mobile home, which has limited kitchen space. But I still wanted a French door style. This fits the bill perfectly. It still has an inside ice maker. I would have appreciated a light in the freezer section. But, overall this is great!

reviews.title: A bit small
reviews.review_text: Bought this fridge to replace a 30 year old top freezer, counter depth fridge. I wanted a bottom freezer and this was one of only 2 that would fit. I do enjoy having the fridge on top but find the freezer too big and the fridge small. I have a full size freezer in the basement so only need freezer space for ice and ice cream. The crispers are smaller than my previous ones too. I also miss having a drawer for meat and cheese. I keep milk on the shelf as it does not stay cold enough in the door bin. (First jug went bad in a couple of days) another shelf might help to give more room but I don't know if it is possible to order one? It is a nice enough fridge and working well so far but but for the price i feel could be designed better. Anyone buying should pay attention to how much space it actually has.

reviews.title: New Fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We've only had it for a few weeks, but we love it so far. It's the perfect size for our small kitchen and has plenty of capacity for two people. The ice maker makes cute little cubes and we use it all the time. The only negative I might say is that is doesn't come in black. The brushed steel still works though. The inside lights are pretty neat, too.

reviews.title: Nice size for smaller family
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I downsized and switched from side by side format and went without the water dispenser. This still has plenty of room for my needs. Ice maker seems to be efficient and I like the smaller cubes. Had a little difficulty installing the bins on the doors. I wish it took the same water filter as my old model. I'm still experimenting with organization. I think the drawers in the freezer are very helpful.

reviews.title: great price and fits my space perfectly
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a 3-door cabinet depth fridge to fit my space. There were only a few to choose from and I picked this unit mainly because of the inside layout. The fridge is quiet and good-looking. It also cools evenly throughout the fridge compartment - a big improvement over my old fridge.

reviews.title: Fits well in a small space
reviews.review_text: We have had our new fridge for a month now and we are happy with it. Our space is smaller and it fits well and looks great. We like the three drawers in the freezer, good for keeping things organized. The ice maker works well and keeps the bin full but the cubes are small and there's no way to make them bigger so they do melt faster. The produce/fruit bins are a decent size but wish they were bigger. I can't always get all the produce in them when we've just picked up groceries. The freezer needs a light, that would be helpful. Overall I'm happy with the fridge.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: We have had our fridge for about a month now and I am enjoying it everyday. Went from a freezer on top to this model so a huge improvement. Shelves and door cubbies are great, and I love the counter depth. The freezer section is easy to keep organized with the drawers. I added to clear bins to the fridge on one shallow shelf to hold meats and cheeses for extra organization!

reviews.title: Bought it with hesitation but am happy with it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have a small NYC kitchen under renovation and loved the look of the Frigidaire professional gas range and needed a new 33 inch fridge to update the look. My options were very limited in a counter depth and I really didn't want French doors or a freezer in the bottom. So this fridge was everything I didn't want. I have gotten use to it, love the lighting in the fridge and temp controls, also love the deep door bins. The freezer is nice but I miss having a light. I'm glad I bought it in the end. Wish they made the gallery 32 inch in counter depth.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The refrigerator is great so far, only drawback is that is not a light in the bottom freezer! Have to open the refrigerator section to fully see all contents in freezer! Other than that, everything is good!

reviews.title: Small but spacious
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This refrigerator replaced a side-by-side that stopped working. The Frigidaire is spacious for its size, I have only had it a few weeks but it appears to be a great choice. I needed a smaller fridge due to cabinets built around the refrigerator. The counter-depth was a good option as it takes up less footprint but is still spacious for a small refrigerator. I was worried about the size of the freezer, but it is very roomy. The only down size is there is no light in the freezer which I knew about from previous reviews. It would be nice if there was a light.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We love the double doors and the fact that no bending to reach inside refrigerator especially for my 84 year old mother, well lit well designed with alot of space on the door shelves. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: My new fridge
reviews.review_text: I bought a new refrigerator last month. So far I absolutely love it. It keeps everything at a perfect temperature and fits perfectly in my small kitchen. I had trouble at first figuring out how to install the lower door bins. I'm not terribly mechanically inclined. The fellow at Frigidaire help line assisted me and it became obvious where they fit.

reviews.title: Very Happy
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge about a month ago and very happy. It's quiet, easy to clean and like the layout inside the fridge & freezer area. Just one small thing is that I have to keep wiping the handles as fingerprints do show, that's why I rated it a 4 star. Thanks

reviews.title: I love my new Frigidaire bottom freezer refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It is the first bottom freezer refrigerator that I have ever owned and I love it. I lost the use of my legs so I have to use a wheelchair to get around and this new bottom drawer freezer refrigerator has made my life so much easier for me to get food out of the freezer. The refrigerator is designed very well and very well made. The refrigerator compartment is very well designed and the door shelves are adjustable and very strong so they can hold a lot of weight. The drawers drawer's slide in and out very easily. Overall the refrigerator is very comfortable to use and very well designed. I would highly recommend this model for anyone who is looking for a good replacement refrigerator, especially for those who have mobility problems. Fantastic refrigerator!!!! Doug

reviews.title: So far, So good.
reviews.review_text: We've had the fridge a couple weeks now, and so far, so good. Despite having smaller dimensions than our previous fridge, it definitely feels like it stores more because the back is flat. The shelves will be easy to clean. We like that the interior fridge light comes on gently, but there isn't a light in the freezer which we do miss.

reviews.title: Nicely configured
reviews.review_text: I bought this about a month ago. The depth is perfect for a smaller kitchen. The door bins are nicely sized and the spacing options are good. No deli drawer however I prefer having the extra height between shelves. The shelves are old school (not split) so they are easy to keep clean. No comment on the ice maker as I do not use.

reviews.title: Very satisfied with my new fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This fridge is my first counter depth and french door freezer on the bottom refrigerator. I'm extremely happy with the appliance. It's well designed and roomy with adjustable shelves, sturdy bins and drawers. The designers did a great job maximizing the space and not using unnecessary tech.

reviews.title: Great refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This refrigerator works great and looks great. Plenty of room in both the refrigerator and freezer areas. Easy to adjust temperature and the lighting in the refrigerator area is amazing. I do wish there was a light in the freezer area, but that's just my preference. Overall, it's perfect for what we needed.

reviews.title: Spacious refrigerator
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge because the side by side I had required a part which is no longer made. The space for the new fridge was small and given the availability of fridges in my area the choices were few. I picked this fridge because it fit, was available in a few days, was a Frigidaire and looked attractive. I am happy with the space it gives in the refrigerator section, the bright light in there and like the spacious freezer section with ice cube maker.

reviews.title: Great compact fridge!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great compact fridge. Enough space for a smaller family of 2 for day to day storage There's 3 compartments + ice tray in the freezer, and you can get 3 sections in the fridge (one large one for taller bottles). One minor thing, but this fridge doesn't have space for eggs / butter. If you are tight on space, ensure you leave 1/2 in on either side of the fridge to account for the french doors opening outwards at the hinge.

reviews.title: Stylish but small
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This was the only option that fit in my kitchen, its bigger than what was here, but not big enough to have water/ice in the door (my preference). But, all that aside, I'm happy with the style of it and it has an in-freezer ice maker.

reviews.title: Great little fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great little fridge, doesn't have a water dispenser which would make it pretty perfect (even though it has a water line for ice). Freezer is small but the French door fridge actually fits more than it seems.

reviews.title: Got the perfect replacment fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My Samsung three door fridge stopped cooling after only four years from the date of purchase . Wanted to a fridge with a reliable brand without all the bells and whistles .Settled on a French door Frigidaire with the ice maker located in the lower section with the rest of the freezer and no bells and whistles. Have been very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.title: Great fridge!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been very happy with this new fridge. Love that the freezer is on the bottom. Also love the 3 separate drawers in the freezer along with the ice maker. Doors are very spacious and the fruit/vegetable crisper drawers are great. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We had to get a new fridge on the fly after our old one shut down this summer and this fridge is great! We have a smaller space due to cabinets and this one fit perfectly and offers a decent amount of room.

reviews.title: Too soon to tell about overall performance!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really love the sleek exterior and the French doors. The freezer is nicely designed and large for a smaller fridge. The top part is very well lit! The only opportunity for even better function is the door shelves. If they could all go in the same way with the lip at the top, that would be fantastic! Overall this fridge looks like a good looking piece of furniture!

reviews.title: Ice maker is loud
reviews.review_text: Overall the fridge is good but there are some features that I don't love. 1. The ice maker is loud especially when living in a open loft 2. Only 5 1/2 old and both filters ( air and water) already need to be replaced. That's way too soon and the replacements are not cheap so if I have to change them every 5- 6 months it's going to cost ALOT yearly.

reviews.title: Counter width french door appliance is great
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised that a smaller french door fridge existed to fit into the same same as my old fridge. They have a nice ice maker only option that I'm not using yet but I like it's design and convenience of filter replacement in the upper fridge space. Lots of space in both upper and freezer sections. Operates very quietly and looks great.

reviews.title: Great Fridge for a Reasonable Price
reviews.review_text: We have had our new fridge now for about 2 weeks and so far are very pleased with it. We have built in cabinets and needed a fridge that met very specific measurements so our options were quite limited and we weren't sure what we'd think of the fridge once we got it, but it was the one we liked most from our few options. Despite this fridge being nearly the same measurements as our previous one, it seems to have way more room in it and we like the configuration of this one much more. The only downside so far is that the handles have already become quite dinged/scratched from our rings when we're opening and closing the doors. I haven't attempted to buff them out yet with stainless steel cleaner.

reviews.title: Great features
reviews.review_text: I am mostly happy with this fridge. It is well laid out so has plenty of storage space even though it's small. I love that the lights brighten as you open the doors and I love the freezer drawers. The only thing I don't like is that you can see the water tubes and electrical from the side, because the back of the fridge is curved. I wish these were covered by some sort of panel. Not very child-safe…Maybe this fridge is meant for spaces with a cabinet on each side? My kitchen is open to the left of the fridge, so the entire left side of the fridge is exposed. Otherwise happy with it.

reviews.title: Perfect for a small kitchen!
reviews.review_text: This fridge is the perfect size for a small kitchen! The adjustable shelves make it easy to store condiments and sauces. The crisper drawers are large and keep produce fresh. The freezer has many different compartments and works well to store food stacked flat. A great fridge overall!

reviews.title: Love the counter depth feature
reviews.review_text: Bought this refrigerator about a month ago and so far, so good. Purchased it because of our smaller kitchen in an older home. The counter depth and 31 inch width works perfectly for us. We are still adapting to all the door bins, which seem very sturdy. Only thing missing is a specific door bin with a cover to keep butter. It came with an ice-maker inside the freezer compartment which we are not utilizing, but we just turned it off. I also like the smudge free SS and that I can still use my magnets on the front of the fridge.

reviews.title: Spacious. Great layout.
reviews.review_text: Purchased a couple weeks ago and everything is great so far. Well laid out. Love the upper doors/lower freezer design. So much more user friendly than older model fridges. Only complaint is the ice container slides back and forth when opening the freezer. Doesn't seem to be a way to secure it to the freezer drawer more securely. We'll see how it stands the test of time but very happy so far.

reviews.title: Quiet and spacious for a 30 inch counter depth
reviews.review_text: I have been using this fridge for a month and it is operating well. It feels fairly spacious given it small size. The ice machine is a bonus but it does involve a lot of noise unless it is full. I don't like that the crisper on one side does not open unless you open both of the doors. I really I would have liked a compartment for cheese and butter.

reviews.title: Very happy with my refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So far very pleased with my refrigerator. It's very quiet, making plenty of ice. I really like the three shelves in the freezer. It makes it easy to find what I want. It's got more than enough room for me.

reviews.title: Looks great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Fridge has a great design and works well. Fridge part is spacious with plenty of room on the doors. Freezer space is limited and divided into compartments. We do not have the fridge hooked up to the ice maker and the only complaint is it makes a loud vibrating sound a couple times a day as it cycles through to make ice (even though it's not hooked up). Aside from that, very happy with the purchase!

reviews.title: Good Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: This refrigerator is very stylish. It was easy to set up and the temperatures are what they are suppose to be for food storage. I was disappointed that there is no deli drawer but this is an easy work around. Also there is no light in the freezer which I would prefer. Again not a big deal. This fridge is perfect for the size of my family. So far I am pleased with the purchase.

reviews.title: Happy with my new fridge
reviews.review_text: All the features are as described. Measurements where accurate and overall I'm happy. A small drawer would be nice for dairy products but the roomy door shelves are great. The noise of the motor was surprisingly louder than expected but it works and it fits and that's all I expected.

reviews.title: Very Happy
reviews.review_text: Bought this fridge as we were very limited to the physical size and this was the only one that checked all but one of the boxes. Working great so far. There are a few things that are less than perfect for me though. Ice maker doesn't automatically turn off when bin is full, the fridge shelves sag in the middle so I make sure to put heavier items on the sides, miss having a deli drawer and the door storage isn't as adjustable as I would like. However, I am still very happy with the fridge!

reviews.title: Better Then I Hoped
reviews.review_text: Waited for a month for this amazing fridge. Worth the wait! The freezer is so spacious and easy to access everything. Fridge is great with only two shelves to move. I do wish the door shelves had more adjustability. The spot for the gallon milk on the door is too close to the shelf above. Wish there was some more adjustment to move them apart. They are just too close together. But that is my only compliant.

Overall a good refrigerator. For a small fridge seems to have a good bit of room. Like the freezer layout. Wish the HD wouldn't have lost the ice scoop on delivery. Guess they didn't know what it was. Anyway the fridge is great I only one issue. It is smudge proof(no fingerprints) on the doors and that's true. But don't touch the handles,they leave prints every time. Weird. My last fridge didn't do that and it was basically identical.

reviews.title: Perfect fit!
reviews.review_text: I bought this fridge only because it was the only one that would fit. Overall it is a good counter depth fridge. It's quiet and distributes temperature equally throughout. However I wish there was a no ice maker option as the freezer space is limited. Also wish it had a deli drawer.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] A great refrigerator when your space is limited. The stainless steel finish is very nice and makes the refrigerator look updated. I love having the main part of the refrigerator up at high level. The freezer drawer is also well organized and love The icemaker. The only negative is there is no light in the freezer compartment drawer, but it pulls out far enough to be able to see everything without it.

reviews.title: Excellent fridge for small spaces!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We needed something low profile for our small 1940 kitchen, and this fridge fits the bill perfectly. Everything is easy to see and accessible, and the drawer freezer is far more usable than what we saw from other brands. This was the perfect choice for us.
